CustomField.formula: TEXT( FLOOR( IF(AnalysisTotalTime__c >= 24, AnalysisTotalTime__c / 24,0 )) ) & "d " & TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(IF(AnalysisTotalTime__c > 24, AnalysisTotalTime__c / 24,0)*24,24)) ) &"h " & TEXT( FLOOR( ( ROUND(AnalysisTotalTime__c,2)-FLOOR(AnalysisTotalTime__c) ) * 60 ) ) + 'm'
CustomField.label: Tempo de An√°lise (D/H/M)
